column5: Could some smart guy give me the low down on what kind of bait I can bring in. Oh yeah and how much alcohol. Not in any particular order.

You can bring in crawlers that are packed in bedding....no dirt. No other live bait allowed. You can bring in one case of beer, or one liter of alcohol. You will pay duty anything over that amount. Duty is about $7 per case of beer, and about $11 for hard liquor.
